description: Thanks for the hard work, I liked it very much, just hoped it was longer, and BGM would probably make it even better
i love it so far cant wait until its finished

I understand the need for good clean entertainment but this came up a little bit short and I don't recomend unless you enjoy having your character prostrating your self as this seems to be the only goal and reward of the game as the story line with the other character doesn't seem to go anywhere and some of the systems I have downloaded the game onto didn't want to uninstall
summary: stuck in prostration unable to uninstall
